entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
